import { React, useState } from "react"; import { login } from "../api/requests"; const Login = () => { const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); await login(username, password); }; return (

); }; export default Login;
